content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of boiler (position -13.5, 20.0) and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5).

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Lab at position(x)
Consists of lab (position -21.5, 25.5).

### Assembling machine factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and multiple small electric poles providing power.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups connecting various entities, including the offshore pump and boiler.

### Electricity distribution network
Consists of multiple small electric poles providing power to various entities including the lab and assembling machine.

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of stone furnace (position 5.0, -73.0) and stone furnace (position -18.0, -49.0).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access non-existent entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access exists at the specified position before attempting to get its prototype. Verify positions and ensure they are correct.

### Errors when checking attributes of NoneType
- Before accessing attributes of an entity, check if the entity is not None. This prevents AttributeError when the entity does not exist.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities at the target position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
